ConfigurationGroup.title: My Server
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration values to access different server services

MY_SERVER_FTP_HOST_NAME.title: FTP Host Name
MY_SERVER_FTP_HOST_NAME.description: The host name or ip address you use to connect to the ftp server

MY_SERVER_FTP_USERNAME.title: FTP Username
MY_SERVER_FTP_USERNAME.description: The ftp user you wish to use for all Sales Igniter ftp actions

MY_SERVER_FTP_PORT.title: FTP Port
MY_SERVER_FTP_PORT.description: 22 is the normal ftp port, do not change unless you know it's different

MY_SERVER_FTP_USE_PASV.title: Use PASV
MY_SERVER_FTP_USE_PASV.description: Select true if your ftp server requires pasv connections

MY_SERVER_CPANEL_HOST.title: cPanel® Host Name
MY_SERVER_CPANEL_HOST.description: The host name or ip address you use to connect to the cPanel® server application
